resources.string: The time above shows how long it\'s been since you\'ve given a compliment to someone. Hit the button every time you give one! If the time passes ${hours} hours, I\'ll notify you to give another! People don\'t compliment each other enough!
You haven\'t given enough compliments for this to show any relevant statistics yet. Once you have, they\'ll be visible here!

Compliments are a low effort but high reward system: giving a compliment to someone isn\'t much work, while receiving an honest compliment can make someones day. This App will remind you to give out more compliments. It spreads happiness!

"Every time you hit the compliment-button, the app resets its timer. Seeing a high time should remind you to spread some more happiness to those around you. Also, if you pass 48 (or whatever you selected) hours without any compliment-giving, the App will send a notification encouraging you to do some work! This notification service can be turned off in the settings. "
If you have any questions regarding this App, be sure to contact me, the developer, via email at\nnoel.friedrich@outlook.de
Compliment someone now and press the button to reset the timer!
Press the delete button below to delete all stored data. This will irreversibly remove all stored data, including the current settings.
Below is a table of all the times you hit the compliment button. This App does not send any data to any server and will work even when offline. All data is stored locally.
Once the timer reaches <value:notification_hours> hours, a reminding notification will be sent
Send the reminding notification after <value> hours of no compliment
Show a Graph of compliments given since you gave your first one
Show a Graph of compliments given in the last week (if that data is available)
Show a Graph of compliments given in the last month (if that data is available)
The average time between compliments is X.
Your first recorded compliment has been given X ago.
In total, you have given X compliments.
